/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a low angle, looking upwards towards the sky, giving a sense of grandeur to the scene. The street is lined with modern buildings, their facades predominantly white and gray, punctuated by occasional blue and green accents. The buildings are adorned with numerous windows and balconies, hinting at the bustling life within. Bare trees, devoid of leaves, stand sentinel along the street, their stark silhouettes contrasting against the clear blue sky. The sun shines brightly, casting a warm glow over the scene and highlighting the architectural details of the buildings. The image is a blend of urban architecture and natural elements, presenting a typical day on a street in Beijing.
